application.doc: Retrieving the list of federated directories

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the list of federated directories
method.doc: To retrieve the list of currently configured federated directories, issue an HTTP GET command on the federated directories resource URI.

representation.name: FederatedDirectoriesJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: id
param.doc: The identifier for the federated directory.
